name: export-rois
label: Export ROIs
description: A gear for exporting ROI's saved in the OHIF viewer to CSV's
author: Flywheel SSE

Subject IDs.description: A list of subject ID's to export, separated by commas.  Will export all ROIS from all Subjects if absent

gear_log_level.description: The level at which the gear will log.

dry_run.description: Only log what changes would be made, do not update anything.
